We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private TimeProfile _tp;
// In Initialize()
_tp = TP(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_tp.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Volume Per Price", _tp.VolumePerPrice);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Profile High", _tp.ProfileHigh);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Profile Low", _tp.ProfileLow);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP P O C Price", _tp.POCPrice);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP P O C Volume", _tp.POCVolume);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Value Area Volume", _tp.ValueAreaVolume);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Value Area High", _tp.ValueAreaHigh);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Value Area Low", _tp.ValueAreaLow);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TP Current", _tp.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.tp = self.TP(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.tp.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Volume Per Price", self.tp.VolumePerPrice);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Profile High", self.tp.ProfileHigh);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Profile Low", self.tp.ProfileLow);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP P O C Price", self.tp.POCPrice);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP P O C Volume", self.tp.POCVolume);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Value Area Volume", self.tp.ValueAreaVolume);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Value Area High", self.tp.ValueAreaHigh);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Value Area Low", self.tp.ValueAreaLow);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TP Current", self.tp.Current);
